author: MovieGasm‍․com
description:
👽 PREDATOR: BADLANDS — “The Unkillable Creature” Trailer (2025) Comic-Con Special 🪖
The hunt evolves… and so does the terror. Predator: Badlands drops its Comic-Con trailer with fresh intensity, showcasing new creatures, ruthless tactics, and a hunting ground built for survival — or extinction.

Movie Overview:👽
In this next chapter, Earth’s harshest wastelands become the ultimate battleground. As humanity struggles for scrap and shelter, a new breed of Yautja descends, driven by ancient instincts and deadly innovations. When survival becomes a war, no one is safe.

A huge thank you to All of our Channel Members! 
Ya'll really do keep the lights on for us over here.
- The audio claims for our promotional features are getting out of hand.

👇 Do you survive the hunt… or become the prey?
#PredatorBadlands #ComicCon2025 #TheUnkillableCreature #PredatorMovie #OfficialTrailer #4KTrailer #AlienHunter #YautjaReturns
